compoundRewards().details: This increases the staked amount with accumulated rewards

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_TIME_WEIGHT().notice: Maximum time weight multiplier (4x for 4 years)

MULTIPLIER_3_MONTHS().notice: Time-based reward multipliers (based on lock duration)

STAKING_APR().notice: Staking APR (20% = 2000 basis points) - Updated from 12% based on economic simulation

TIER_BASIC().notice: Minimum stake amounts for each tier

addToStake(uint256).notice: Add more tokens to existing stake

authorizedSlashers(address).notice: Authorized slashers (contracts that can slash stakes)

calculatePendingRewards(address).notice: Calculate pending rewards for a staker

getEffectiveAPR(uint256).notice: Get expected APR for a given lock duration

getStake(address).notice: Get stake information for a user

getVotingPower(address).notice: Get voting power for a staker

slash(address,uint256,string).notice: Slash a staker's tokens for misbehavior

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: Stake AINU tokens for a specific duration

totalStaked().notice: Total amount staked across all users
